Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
We explain how to configure

  • the content types shown in the "Add Content" dialog,
  • the available formatters,
  • the available dynamic functions,
  • the "Basic Properties" dialog,
  • the availability of detail pages,
  • the template pages available.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: What is visible where? - Configure the content types visible in the "Add wizard", the available model pages, detail pages, formatters and basic properties.

AlkaconDocumentationTopicFrame.Keywords: configuration, ADE, module configuration, sitemap configuration, overview
